title: cycling between "unable to connect to login queue" and "incorrect password" (password is fine)
body:
tried logging on ~10 times and each time getting one the above errors. Server status indicates servers are fine, and password is working fine on match history on lol oce etc/no evidence account has been compromised.

Managed to get on after one attempt, but chat could not connect (which in the past resulted in getting into game lobbies and unable to see chat/possibly  chat myself so I exited out. Have been unable to get back in for the above reasons since).

Ideas? was working fine last night. Tried restarting router (though internet connection is working fine)

replies.body: There's a client notification up now, it's a server side issue. They're working on it.
I just got the exact same issue, still trying to log in I'm gonna send a bug report most likely.

Yep sorry about this, there appear to be some login issues now in a couple of regions. We're working on solving ASAP.

Ranked has been disabled while we work on a fix.

EDIT: The issue should now be resolved!
